title: Media Invited to Learn About NASA Tools, Resources for Agriculture
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference at 1:30 p.m. CDT Thursday, Aug. 25, to discuss the agency’s tools, resources, and science research available to the agriculture community.

title: Sky Perfect JSAT picks SpaceX’s Starship for 2024 satellite launch
summary: Sky Perfect JSAT said Aug. 18 it has picked SpaceX’s Starship rocket to launch its Superbird-9 satellite in 2024.

title: Ukraine gains enhanced access to Iceye imagery and data
summary: Iceye is transferring the full capability of one synthetic aperture radar satellite collecting imagery and data around Ukraine plus access to other satellites in its constellation to the Ukrainian government under a contract with a charitable organization.

title: La NASA ofrece una sesión informativa y entrevistas con el astronauta Frank Rubio antes de su despegue
summary: El astronauta de la NASA Frank Rubio discutirá su inminente misión a la Estación Espacial Internacional durante una conferencia de prensa y entrevistas de seguimiento.

title: NASA Hosts Astronaut Frank Rubio’s Prelaunch News Briefing, Interviews
summary: NASA astronaut Frank Rubio will virtually discuss his upcoming mission to the International Space Station during a news conference and follow-on interviews.

title: Europe is seriously considering a major investment in space-based solar power
summary: Such an initiative would require a 200-fold increase over current space-lift capacity.

title: Mynaric hires president to oversee production of laser communications systems
summary: Mynaric has hired an experienced executive from the optical communications and semiconductor industries as its new president, charged with overseeing production of its laser communications systems.

title: R3-IoT becomes Krucial to branch out of aquaculture
summary: Scottish startup R3-IoT rebranded as Krucial Aug. 18 amid plans to expand its connectivity solutions for remote sensors out of the aquaculture market.

title: NASA to Announce Candidate Landing Regions for Artemis III Moon Mission
summary: NASA will hold a media teleconference at 2 p.m. EDT Friday, Aug. 19, to announce regions near the lunar South Pole the agency has identified as potential areas for astronauts to land as part of the Artemis III mission, targeted for 2025.

title: SLS arrives at the pad for Artemis 1 launch
summary: NASA’s Space Launch System made its third trip to the launch pad Aug. 17, this time with the intent of lifting by early next month.
